text: Anna and the King of Siam is a 1946 American drama movie directed by John Cromwell and is an adaptation of the 1944 novel of the same name by Margaret Landon. It stars Irene Dunne, Rex Harrison, Linda Darnell and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It won two Oscars in 1947. ==References== == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1946 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John Cromwell Category:Movies set in Thailand
title: Anna and the King of Siam (movie)
